mapper.select: select emp_no, emp_name, position_name, birth, low_dept_no, email, cell_phone, emp_tel from emp e join position p on e.position_no = p.position_no where emp_no = #{emp_no}
select b.branch_name, d.dept_name, l.low_dept_name from branch b join dept d on b.branch_no = d.branch_no join low_dept l on d.dept_no = l.dept_no where l.low_dept_no = #{low_dept_no}
